law.catch_line: Horses conceived by artificial insemination or other means eligible to race.
law.text: Quarter horses, paint horses, Appaloosas, and Arabian horses conceived by artificial insemination or other means shall be eligible to race under the provisions of this chapter.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 8, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 1, effective April 22, 2006. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 1, effective July 13, 2004; and ch. 191, sec. 54, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 33, effective March 30, 1992. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 296, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 376, sec. 9. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 11.

metadata.lrc-note: (4/22/2006). 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 4, provides that the Act, which included an amendment to this statute, shall be known as the "2006 Kentucky Equine Competitiveness Act."
